name: puddles and pebbles
description: I did research on the randomness condition of ellipses and lines. The plan was to use simple forms to draw attention to a random location of the map. As a result it turned into the nice abstract composition which does not repead, and reminds pebbles flying into the water.
background: The following system refers to the idea of the aesthetic art piece, being regenerated by the system itself. Simply refers to the first lecture of the Creative Coding Course
